properties.displayName: System Control Panel Item Loaded From Uncommon Location
properties.query:
DeviceImageLoadEvents
| where (FolderPath endswith "\\hdwwiz.cpl" or FolderPath endswith "\\appwiz.cpl") and (not((FolderPath contains ":\\Windows\\System32\\" or FolderPath contains ":\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\" or FolderPath contains ":\\Windows\\WinSxS\\")))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects image load events of system control panel items (.cpl) from uncommon or non-system locations which might be the result of sideloading.
